Get a dataset of a list of stock_cd from a table in stock_db

Source: R/stock-db.R, R/stock-db-gta.R
get_stock_dataset.Rd

Generic function to get a dataset of a list of stock_cd from table in stock.

get_stock_dataset(stock_db, table_name, stock_cd_list = NULL, ...)

# S4 method for gta_db
get_stock_dataset(stock_db, table_name, stock_cd_list = NULL, ...)

Arguments

stock_db

A stock database object to operate.
table_name

Name of target table.
stock_cd_list

A character vector of stock cd, default value of NULL means. all stock data will be returned.
...

Extra arguments to be passed to methods.

Value

A data frame on succeed otherwise NULL.

Functions

  • get_stock_dataset,gta_db-method: get a dataset of a list of stock_cd from table in a database of gta_db class

See also

Other stock_db generics: close_stock_db(), code2name(), dir_path_db(), fetch_table_dataset(), get_factors_info(), get_factors(), get_financial_report(), get_indicators_from_source(), get_indicators(), get_market_return(), get_profile(), get_riskfree_rate(), get_spt_stocks(), get_stock_industry(), get_stock_return(), get_table_dataset(), init_stock_db(), list_stock_tables(), name2code(), open_stock_db(), save_indicators_to_source()

Examples

if (FALSE) {
ds_trd_dalyr.df <- get_stock_dataset(stock_db,
                            table_name = "TRD_Dalyr_鏃ヤ釜鑲″洖鎶ョ巼",
                            stock_cd_list = c("600066", "000550"))
}
